Class UltraSwipeScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.Scroller
      • fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.UltraSwipeScroller

  • public class UltraSwipeScroller
extends Scroller
    Class which implements scroller in UltraSwipe It enables to operate the scrolling speed animation after fling

    Klawikowski
